name: AWS DynamoDB
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS DynamoDB 节点。主要用于: Consume the AWS DynamoDB API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: iam

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: item

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: upsert
available_options: Create or Update (值: upsert) - Create a new record, or update the current one if it already exists (upsert)
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many items

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.description: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: Table to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: eanUi (值: None) - One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. View details.
readType (值: None) - Type of read to perform on the table. View details.

returnValues.name: returnValues
returnValues.description: Use ReturnValues if you want to get the item attributes as they appeared before they were deleted
returnValues.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return | 作用: Use ReturnValues if you want to get the item attributes as they appeared before they were deleted | 默认值: NONE
available_options: Attribute Values (值: ALL_OLD) - The content of the old item is returned

keysUi.name: keysUi
keysUi.description: Item's primary key. For example, with a simple primary key, you only need to provide a value for the partition key. For a composite primary key, you must provide values for both the partition key and the sort key.
keysUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keys | 作用: Item's primary key. For example, with a simple primary key, you only need to provide a value for the partition key. For a composite primary key, you must provide values for both the partition key and the sort key. | 默认值: {}

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

select.name: select
select.natural_language_description: 参数名: Select | 默认值: ALL_ATTRIBUTES
available_options: Specific Attributes (值: SPECIFIC_ATTRIBUTES) - Select them in Attributes to Select under Additional Fields

scan.name: scan
scan.description: Whether to do an scan or query. Check differences.
scan.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scan | 作用: Whether to do an scan or query. Check differences. | 默认值: False

filterExpression.name: filterExpression
filterExpression.description: A filter expression determines which items within the Scan results should be returned to you. All of the other results are discarded. Empty value will return all Scan results.
filterExpression.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter Expression | 作用: A filter expression determines which items within the Scan results should be returned to you. All of the other results are discarded. Empty value will return all Scan results.

keyConditionExpression.name: keyConditionExpression
keyConditionExpression.description: Condition to determine the items to be retrieved. The condition must perform an equality test on a single partition key value, in this format: `partitionKeyName = :partitionkeyval`
keyConditionExpression.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Condition Expression | 作用: Condition to determine the items to be retrieved. The condition must perform an equality test on a single partition key value, in this format: `partitionKeyName = :partitionkeyval` | (必填项)

eavUi.name: eavUi
eavUi.description: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression
eavUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expression Attribute Values | 作用: Substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression | 默认值: {} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: indexName (值: None) - Name of the index to query. It can be any secondary local or global index on the table.

projectionExpression (值: None) - Text that identifies one or more attributes to retrieve from the table. These attributes can include scalars, sets, or elements of a JSON document. The attributes in the expression must be separated by commas.

filterExpression (值: None) - Text that contains conditions that DynamoDB applies after the Query operation, but before the data is returned. Items that do not satisfy the FilterExpression criteria are not returned.
eanUi (值: None) - One or more substitution tokens for attribute names in an expression. Check Info.
